org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc

Interface RiverFlow<RC extends RiverContext>

  • Type Parameters:
    RC -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColumnRiverFlow, SimpleRiverFlow

    public interface RiverFlow<RC extends RiverContext>
    A RiverFlow is the controlling component for creatin RiverContexts which can be processed independently from each other. By doing this, RiverContexts can be processed
